alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:13PM CDT until June 14 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTY... At 213 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vandiver, or near Leeds, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Leeds, Childersburg, Vincent, Harpersville, Vandiver and Sterrett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
